system_profile.intended_purpose: Support medical professionals with diagnostic or treatment-related insights for radiology imaging
non_goals: Does not make final clinical decisions autonomously
Does not process data of minors without parental consent

annex_iii_classification.note: Healthcare AI supporting medical decisions - classified as high-risk under Annex III

risk_register.description: Incorrect diagnostic suggestion leading to delayed treatment
risk_register.mitigation: Mandatory physician review before any clinical action. System outputs clearly labeled as suggestions only.

risk_register.description: Model drift degrading diagnostic accuracy over time
risk_register.mitigation: Quarterly performance benchmarking against validated test sets. Automated drift detection alerts.

risk_register.description: Privacy breach via diagnostic image logging
risk_register.mitigation: Data minimization policy. All images anonymized before processing. Access controls enforced.

risk_register.description: Bias against underrepresented demographic groups in training data
risk_register.mitigation: Pre-deployment fairness audit. Stratified performance metrics by demographic group.

risk_register.description: System unavailability during critical diagnostic workflow
risk_register.mitigation: Graceful fallback to manual workflow. 99.9% uptime SLA with monitoring.

human_oversight.description: All AI-generated diagnostic suggestions require explicit physician confirmation before clinical action.
human_oversight.override_mechanism: Physician can dismiss, modify, or override any AI suggestion.
human_oversight.escalation_path: Unresolved disagreements escalate to department head.

governance_readiness.note: Lite tier - baseline artifacts complete. For consistency checks and evidence bundles, upgrade to Pro or Enterprise.

disclaimer: Engineering governance artifacts only. Not legal advice. No compliance guarantee. Powered by X-Loop3 Labs.
